content:
We also provide the mechanical electrical and plumbing (MEP) engineering service. MEP is well recognized in providing clients with specific and comprehensive services from new building designs, retrofit or upgrade designs, building condition assessments, feasibility studies, energy audits, and overall system reviews.

  • Electrical System
  • Lightning Protection System
  • Telecommunication System
  • Computer Network System
  • PA System
  • CCTV System
  • MATV System
  • Access Control System
  • Fire Alarm System
  • Air Conditioning System
  • Ventilation System
  • Smoke Control System
  • Building Management System
  • Water Supply and Waste Water System
  • Fire Safety and Protection System
